text: Bofarnel is a hamlet in Cornwall, England, in the United Kingdom. It lies within the civil parish of St Winnow, 6 miles (6.4 km) southeast of Bodmin and 2.5 miles (4 km) north of Lostwithiel.Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 200 Newquay & Bodmin Bodmin Parkway railway station is 1 km to the north of the hamlet. ==References== ==External links== Category:Hamlets in Cornwall
title: Bofarnel
